title: Kristin Cavallari flashes her toned tummy in black crop top and a leather skirt
text:
She's the founder and CEO of Uncommon James jewelry.

So it was no surprise that Kristin Cavallari was front and center at the Grand Opening of her Chicago store on Friday, with hubby Jay Cutler by her side.

The 32-year-old reality TV star flashed her taut tummy in an elegant black crop top.

Aesthetically blessed: Kristin Cavallari was front and center at the Grand Opening of her Chicago store on Friday, with hubby Jay Cutler by her side

She paired the skin-baring garment with a leather skirt and a pair of strappy heels.

Her blonde tresses fell in luxurious waves across her shoulders and she wore minimal makeup for her VIP appearance.

Meanwhile, her former Chicago Bears quarterback husband looked sharp in a gray turtleneck beneath a check jacket.

The couple have been married since 2013 and co-star in her show Very Cavallari.

Top of the crops! The 32-year-old reality TV star flashed her taut tummy in an elegant black crop top

Good hair day: Her blonde tresses fell in luxurious waves across her shoulders and she wore minimal makeup for her VIP appearance

The Chicago Uncommon James store is the brand's third bricks-and-mortar location.

There is a Los Angeles store at The Grove and the brand's flagship store in Nashville, Tennessee.

The Chicago store officially opens its doors to the public on Saturday.

Well-heeled: She paired the skin-baring garment with a leather skirt and a pair of strappy heels
description: Kristin Cavallari was front and center at the Grand Opening of her Chicago store on Friday, with hubby Jay Cutler by her side.
